greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle of compositions of n into exactly k parts each no more than k.
link: Index entries for sequences related to compositions
formula: G.f. of column k is: x^k*(1-x^k)^k/(1-x)^k for k>=1. - _Paul D. Hanna_, Jan 25 2013
xref: Column sums are A000312. Row sums are A077229. Central diagonal is A000984 offset. Right hand side is right hand side of A007318. Cf. A077228.
results.author: _Henry Bottomley_, Oct 29 2002
